Text: People need to start seeding, selfish fucks.
thanks uploader,seems like good quaility from the one i have watched so far

By using the image of the DVD boxset and your copy/paste description you are fooling people into thinking these are DVD rips.  They are not.  They are TV rips complete with BBC logo and the quality is rather poor.

After reading my previous comment, I think I was a bit too harsh concerning quality.  It's fine for casual viewing, but a bit soft and pixelated when viewed full screen due to a rather low bit rate.

I still think your description should have made it clear they are TV rips from BBC3 and not DVD rips though.

Thanks for the up.
